Title: Learning to Fly, Part 2
Plot:
The end-of-year production has arrived and Tara is rehearsing her solo in Act 2 of The Nutcracker. Director Sebastian Karamakov is not happy with her performance and threatens to put Abigail in her place.
 When Tara gets her costume fitted she learns many famous ballerinas have also worn the same nightgown ? giving her a new boost of confidence. But when Abigail hides Tara's costume, trouble starts again and Tara's best friend, Kat is not around to help. Kat has left for a road trip with musicia
